name: Shiva's Guard
description: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

abilities.name: Arctic Blast
abilities.description: Emits an expanding freezing wave that follows and covers an area around the caster, dealing damage and slowing movement speed of enemies as it reaches them.
notes: Does not interrupt the caster's channeling abilities upon cast. Exception: Tricks of the Trade.
Arctic Blast is centered on the caster for the full duration.
The blast spreads at a speed of 400, taking 2.25 seconds to cover the whole radius.
Affects the entire area while expanding, the area of effect is not a ring.
Also weakens enemies hit by the wave, applying a debuff that amplifies any spell damage they take. The debuff is applied before the ability's damage is applied.
Shares a debuff with Magic Weakness, the last applied source overrides previous sources.
Provides 800 radius flying vision, following the caster and leaving a trail of vision which lasts for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Freezing Aura
abilities.description: Reduces the attack speed, as well as the effectiveness of healing and health restoration of nearby enemies.
notes: Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
Does not affects invulnerable or hidden enemies.
The status debuff icon on enemies only shows up when the affected unit has vision over the source.

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally.
The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
60 mana, 0.25 mana regeneration and 0.5% flat base magic resistance.
5 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes.
6.75 main attack damage to universal heroes.
